EnhanceR Symposium 2022

Research IT Trends in Switzerland

  • Home
  • Timetable
  • Registration

EnhanceR Symposium 2022 will take place in Bern on Tuesday, November 29, 2022.

Location: Hochschulstrasse 4, Hauptgebäude, room 501 (Kuppelraum)

Schedule
9:30–10:00 Registration / Coffee
10:00–10:30 Welcome
10:30–13:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions
13:00–14:00 Lunch (restaurant Grosse Schanze)
14:00–14:30 Community needs discussion
14:30–16:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions
16:00–16:15 Farewell

Exact schedule of show-and-tell topics will be posted closer to the event.

The list of confirmed topics to date includes:

  • Agroscope: Access to HPC prototype
  • Bioinformatics co-analysis service at ETH Zurich
  • Business Models for Research Support Units
  • Data Science support at ETH - from computer vision to NLP
  • datapool - data warehouse for sensor data
  • E-Assessment on BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)
  • inseri.swiss - connecting data repositories, research methods, and researchers
  • openRDM.swiss: data management service for the Swiss academic community
  • Overview of CSCS Services and Partners
  • UniFR - Vulnerability Scanner on Scientific IT machines
  • Using SLEPc to solve eigenvalue problems in Matlab
